name: Caffeine Squad
description:
Defend against hordes of enemies with your energy drink fuelled soldiers. Make sure to keep buying them energy drinks, or their short term memory will make them forget their upgrades!

Extract the .zip and run the .exe file "nw".

Created by Hephaestu5, thermickhan and Harry Pepe IV for the JamGoJam JamDNA #3 in 4 days.
